title: [QUESTION] Images cannot be saved in SkiaSharp

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
I am not sure what you mean by:

> The image cannot be saved

Is there a crash, and error or saves a blank image?

Also, the logic for getting the data seems to be correct: `image.Encode().ToArray()`

Maybe the user is using an older/newer device that has different restrictions on what needs to be done. But, if you can get the byte array from the image, then I am not sure if I can help as I can't see the implementation for `IPhotoLibrary`

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
Closing this as it appears to be an issue with the logic that saves the photo as all skia does is get provide the image data. Please re-open with a repro/sample demonstrating the issue.

Please also include platform/OS and version information.
